Product.name: World of Warcraft
Product.description: One of the greatest and most popular MMORPGs of all time still counting over 5 million players

Product.name: Starcraft 2
Product.description: It's Jim Raynor with a rag tag band of outlaws against the evil emporor Arcturusk Mengsk. Classic Star Wars scenario

Product.name: Warcraft 3
Product.description: The origin of all your favorite lore characters from the warcraft universe. Including Arthas, Thrall and Sylvanas

Product.name: Counter Strike
Product.description: It's Terrorists... VS. Counter Terrorists. Classic stand off

Product.name: League of Legends
Product.description: The game that copied the gameplay of the WC3 mod DOTA and made it a global phenomenon
